this angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) inhibitor medication helps lower blood pressure and reduce strain on the heart, which can help prevent a second heart attack after one has occurred.', 'The standard starting dose for hypertension management is usually 10 mg once daily taken orally', "It's essential to take Lisinopril at the same time every day, ideally in the morning with a full glass of water unless advised otherwise by your doctor", 'Do not double up doses if you miss one; instead, continue taking the medication as prescribed and discuss any missed doses with your healthcare provider at your next appointment or sooner if necessary.', 'Lisinopril can cause side effects like dizziness (particularly when standing), headaches, cough, or changes in taste perception', 'While on Lisinopril, avoid potassinasal diuretics (water pills) without consulting with your healthcare provider since the combination can lead to low blood pressure and kidney problems.', 'Ensure you have regular follow-ups with your doctor for monitoring of blood pressure, medication effectiveness, and potential side effects']
